headline: Fintech unicorn Zilch lands payments licence from City watchdog
summary: One of Britain’s most prominent fintech unicorns has secured a payments services licence from UK regulators as it hunts for acquisition targets ahead of an eventual move to list its shares publicly.  Sky News understands that Zilch, which has more than five million customers, will announce on Thursday that it has been awarded the licence by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).  It is also expected to say that it has deepened its relationship with Visa, the global payments network, by becoming a direct, principal member, which will pave the way for new payment-related collaborations between the two companies.

headline: Coherent and Beazer Homes have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: COHR rides surging AI/datacenter demand, doubling revenue projections and deepening ties with NVIDIA and Apple.

headline: Mastercard Turns on the Cash Tap: Buybacks Boom, Dividends Bloom
summary: MA boosts shareholder rewards with a new $14B buyback and a 14% dividend hike as strong cash flow fuels continued capital returns.

raw.headline: Mastercard Turns on the Cash Tap: Buybacks Boom, Dividends Bloom

headline: NayaPay Launches Global QR Payments for Pakistanis via Alipay+
summary: SINGAPORE, December 10, 2025--NayaPay, one of Pakistan’s fastest growing fintech platforms, has launched global QR payments in collaboration with Alipay+, Ant International’s global wallet gateway.
